Freezer-Training Method
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Freezer-Training Method
By Lil_Literalist on Friday, February 18, 2005 - 06:16 pm:

I figured out that in addition to freezer training one monster, you can raise SEVERAL! I raised a Dragon/Arrowhead to Master Class, and in between battles, I raised a Durahan/Mogi in A-Rank, a pure Antlan in C-rank, and a pure Suezo in D-rank. In the course of a year, I managed to find about 5 weeks in which I had to start another monster in E-Rank. This way will not only help you beat the game really fast, it will get you a load of money and items.
